profile.name: Gabriel
profile.title: Senior Web Frontend React Developer - github.com/W01fw00d
profile.description:
Senior Frontend Web Developer. Javascript/Typescript (React, Node.js, Webpack). Testing (Jest, Cypress). Desarrollador de Dev Toolkits, MicroFrontend Architecture, Reusable Components, Design Systems, Internal Tools. Agile (SCRUM, Kanban), Git, Clean Code, Code Review, Software Craftmanship.

100% Remote (Looking for a Remote and Asynchronous First culture).

I work in international agile teams, so my English competency is Professional and I’m used to very diverse working cultures (Japan, France, Spain…).

Get to know me! I’m:

- A writer: "The Nurse who coded": A Tech Blog in both text (https://thenursewhocoded.hashnode.dev/) and audio (https://anchor.fm/gabriel-romaymachado/episodes/How-I-learned-to-code-euqd4j) formats
- A Team Player: https://gist.github.com/W01fw00d/6f4dd234e561f89ae3dafd222ecb44f7 (Translated Agile Article)
- Involved in my community: Transcribed TV Interview (https://gist.github.com/W01fw00d/8c80c137d4f0d3c6514cdcefb81290b6)
- Proactive: https://github.com/W01fw00d
